page.title: 02HOUSING (West Block)
page.content: In squares 9269,9369 and 9370 is a modern housing estate which is{mainly {council owned},but with expensive private estates in square 9370,east of Skellingthorpe road.Birchwood is laid out along New Town designs with a large central area of shops,services and leisure facilities.The roads are designed to{separate fast traffic}from the pedestrian.The housing is designed in an informal geometric way with closes and cul-de-sacs.A variety of brick colour is used in a mixture of housing styles -{small terraces, {semi-detached,maisonettes in low rise {blocks.}The main area of Birchwood is council owned but some people have bought their houses from the council. Some streets are well maintained but others are not because of broken windows and fences.This new area is beginning to look shabby already.
